Package server

Class serverBackEnd

java.lang.Object
ocsf.server.AbstractServer
server.serverBackEnd
All Implemented Interfaces:
Runnable
public class serverBackEnd extends ocsf.server.AbstractServer
serverBackEnd class used for managing the connections in the system and handling/sending messages from/to clients. It extends OCSF AbstractServer and overrides methods of it.

  • Method Details

    • handleMessageFromClient

      protected void handleMessageFromClient(Object msg, ocsf.server.ConnectionToClient client)
      Handles messages sent from clients by performing tasks based on the Msg that recieved. It sends a Msg back to a client when tasks performed (depends on the task)
      Specified by:
      handleMessageFromClient in class ocsf.server.AbstractServer
      Parameters:
      msg - the Msg sent from client.
      client - the socket of the sender (ConnectionToClient)

    • sendMsg

      protected void sendMsg(ocsf.server.ConnectionToClient client, Msg taskMsg) throws IOException
      Sends a Msg object to a client. It appends a message to the server console (depends on the task).
      Parameters:
      client - the socket of the sender (ConnectionToClient)
      taskMsg - the Msg object to send the client.
      Throws:
      IOException - when sending Msg failed.
